name: Old Folks Senior Sanctuary
description:
You are taking care of old folks who wander in and out. Keep the old folks happy they will pay you back in delicious butterscotch candies!

Left mouse - to click on buttons and pick up candies! Also can be used to straighten objects in the scene.

Right mouse - Pick up old people and objects, then drop them again!

Credits:
